 1990-08731990-05-100,  FIN,  IT, 
PrecisAuthority for the EXPORT DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION to make a loan to the CHINA NATIONAL CHEMICAL CONSTRUCTION CORPORATION (acting on behalf of the Liaoyang Electrochemical Factory) in order to finance the purchase of certain goods and services required for the construction of a carbon disulphide plant which are to be supplied by KLOCKNER STADLER HURTER LTD.
